code:
[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic [1023:0] in,
    input logic [7:0] sel,
    output logic [3:0] out
);

    always @(*) begin
        out = in[sel[7:0] * 4 +: 4]; // Ensure the selection uses the full bit-width of sel
    end

endmodule
```
[DONE]

issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
